name: p_1_1
nat_lang_statement: Write a method that returns the greeting "Hugo".

name: p_1_2
nat_lang_statement: Write a method that returns the sum of the first ten positive integers, 1 + 2 + ... + 10.

name: p_1_3
nat_lang_statement: Write a method that returns the product of the first ten positive integers, 1 × 2 × ... × 10.

name: p_1_4
nat_lang_statement: Write a method that returns the balance of an account after the first, second, and third year. The account has an initial balance of $1,000 and earns 5 percent interest per year.

dafny.method_signature: p_1_4() returns (first : real, second : real, third : real)

name: p_1_5
nat_lang_statement: Write a method that returns the name Dave inside a box on the screen. Do your best to approximate lines with characters such as | - +.

name: p_1_6
nat_lang_statement: Write a method that returns the name Harry in large letters.

name: p_1_7
nat_lang_statement: Write a method that returns a face in ASCII art.

name: p_1_8
nat_lang_statement: Write a method that returns an imitation of a Piet Mondrian painting. (Search the Internet if you are not familiar with his paintings.) Use character sequences such as @@@ or ::: to indicate different colors, and use - and | to form lines.

name: p_1_9
nat_lang_statement: Write a method that returns a house in ASCII art.

name: p_1_10
nat_lang_statement: Write a method that returns an animal speaking a greeting in ASCII art.
